lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Charlie Puth/Matthew Musto
[00:00.022] 作词 : Charlie Puth/Matthew Musto
[00:00.068]I can see you're struggling
[00:02.198]Promise you'll find love again
[00:04.484]Yeah, it will be alright
[00:06.660]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[00:08.721]Yeah, why you gotta try so hard?
[00:10.666]Counting calories and carbs
[00:12.778]Another trip across the world
[00:14.806]I go so hard tryna
[00:16.999]Make you feel just like a queen
[00:19.053]You don't need a camera to make a scene
[00:21.232]You were born like that, no Maybelline
[00:23.237]When you first wake up, you're bad to me
[00:25.248]Pop another addy, no sleep tonight
[00:27.536]Can't push the wheel slow, I'm speedin' right
[00:29.507]Over to the crib as we need to slide
[00:31.582]But you take so long makin' up your mind
[00:33.665]All black dress, do your back
[00:35.770]Leave ten times, I'll take you back
[00:37.887]Why you wanna look like someone else?
[00:40.116]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[00:42.375]I can see you're struggling
[00:44.321]Promise you'll find love again
[00:46.419]It will be alright
[00:48.517]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[00:50.602]Try not to fall apart
[00:52.713]You're perfect just the way you are
[00:54.854]It will be alright
[00:56.981]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[00:59.120]Why you gotta compare our lives to pics you see on your timeline?
[01:03.195]Another shot of Hennessy
[01:05.228]I try so hard not to act like a dick when I'm 'round your friends
[01:09.481]Mood swings up and down again
[01:11.431]Hollywood Hills where we play pretend
[01:13.701]No one happy, but they're good at fakin' it
[01:15.832]Pop up in the party show face tonight
[01:17.926]I don't really smoke, but I need the vibes
[01:20.077]You love to get high, she need the flights
[01:22.109]Standin' so high, swear she can fly
[01:24.292]And just like that you get sad
[01:26.363]Let's go home, girl, this party so whack
[01:28.526]Why you wanna be like someone else?
[01:30.663]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[01:32.677]I can see you're struggling (Yeah)
[01:34.749]Promise you'll find love again
[01:36.860]It will be alright (It'll be alright)
[01:38.901]Why are you so hard on yourself? (Yeah)
[01:41.144]Try not to fall apart
[01:43.153]You're perfect just the way you are
[01:45.319]It will be alright
[01:46.963]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[01:50.625]Girl, when you look in a mirror
[01:54.696]I hope you see what I see clearer
[01:58.971]All that I want you to know
[02:01.795]Is that you're perfect the way that you are
[02:05.168]Oh, the way you are (Oh, the way you are)
[02:09.534]Ooh
[02:11.871]Oh, why are you so hard on yourself?
[02:15.008]I can see you're struggling
[02:17.045]Promise you'll find love again
[02:19.112]It will be alright
[02:20.690]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[02:23.202]Try not to fall apart
[02:25.358]You're perfect just the way you are
[02:27.489]It will be alright
[02:28.983]Why are you so hard on yourself?
[02:32.247]Oh, oh (Yeah), oh
tlyric:
[00:00.068]我看得出 你在纠结不停
[00:02.198]我保证 你一定会再度寻得真爱
[00:04.484]会没事的
[00:06.660]你为何要这样强迫自己
[00:08.721]为何要这样奋力尝试
[00:10.666]仔细算着卡路和碳水
[00:12.778]送你又一次的环球旅行
[00:14.806]我那么努力得想
[00:16.999]让你成为自己的女王
[00:19.053]无需相机 你就是镜头焦点
[00:21.232]生来如此 无需妆容修饰
[00:23.237]若你先起床 就会对我使坏
[00:25.248]又一片药下肚 今夜无眠
[00:27.536]我无法减慢 这速率刚刚好
[00:29.507]豪宅之内 春宵一刻应是你我共度
[00:31.582]但你却久久不能定下你的心意
[00:33.665]黑色短裙 为你系上衣带
[00:35.770]你离开十次 我也会追你回来
[00:37.887]你为何想要变成其他人
[00:40.116]你为何要这样强迫自己
[00:42.375]我看得出 你在纠结不停
[00:44.321]我保证 你一定会再度寻得真爱
[00:46.419]会没事的
[00:48.517]你为何要这样强迫自己
[00:50.602]让自己不要崩溃
[00:52.713]你本来的样子就很完美
[00:54.854]都会好的
[00:56.981]你为何要这样强迫自己
[00:59.120]你为何要把我们的生活 和你过去的照片作比
[01:03.195]又是一杯轩尼诗
[01:05.228]在你朋友面前 我尽量不要太失态
[01:09.481]心情升入高空 又再次跌入谷底
[01:11.431]装假表演 身处好莱坞山
[01:13.701]我们都不开心 但至少可以装得出来
[01:15.832]聚会上出现 露出假面
[01:17.926]我并不吸烟 只是享受这氛围
[01:20.077]你想变嗨 想要飞起来
[01:22.109]站得那么高 她一定能飞得起来
[01:24.292]就这样 你又开始难过
[01:26.363]那就回家吧 这聚会也不怎么样
[01:28.526]你为何想要变成其他人
[01:30.663]你为何要这样强迫自己
[01:32.677]我看得出 你在纠结不停
[01:34.749]我保证 你一定会再度寻得真爱
[01:36.860]会没事的
[01:38.901]你为何要这样强迫自己
[01:41.144]让自己不要崩溃
[01:43.153]你本来的样子就很完美
[01:45.319]都会好的
[01:46.963]你为何要这样强迫自己
[01:50.625]当你看镜子的时候
[01:54.696]我看到的东西 希望你看得更明白
[01:58.971]我只是想让你知道
[02:01.795]你本来的样子就很完美
[02:05.168]你本来的样子就很完美
[02:09.534]
[02:11.871]你为何要这样强迫自己
[02:15.008]我看得出 你在纠结不停
[02:17.045]我保证 你一定会再度寻得真爱
[02:19.112]会没事的
[02:20.690]你为何要这样强迫自己
[02:23.202]让自己不要崩溃
[02:25.358]你本来的样子就很完美
[02:27.489]都会好的
[02:28.983]你为何要这样强迫自己
[02:32.247]
